mapper.select: SELECT id , comment , boardId , likeQty , createId , createDt , updateId , updateDt , deleteId , deleteDt , deleteFlag From board_comment_tbl WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false

SELECT bc.id , bc.comment , bc.boardId , bc.likeQty , bc.createId , bc.createDt , ct.nickname AS createName , bc.updateId , bc.updateDt , ut.nickname AS updateName , bc.deleteId , bc.deleteDt , dt.nickname AS deleteName , bc.deleteFlag From board_comment_tbl AS bc LEFT JOIN comment_like_tbl AS cl ON cl.commentTbl = #{commentTbl} AND cl.createId = #{createId} AND bc.id = cl.commentId LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tbl AS ct ON bc.createId = ct.id LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tbl AS ut ON bc.updateId = ut.id LEFT OUTER JOIN user_tbl AS dt ON bc.deleteId = dt.id WHERE bc.boardId = #{boardId} AND bc.deleteFlag = false ORDER BY ${orderByWord} LIMIT #{rowsOnePage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment_tbl WHERE boardId = #{searchTitle} AND deleteFlag = false
mapper.update: UPDATE board_comment_tbl SET likeQty = likeQty + 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
UPDATE board_comment_tbl SET likeQty = likeQty - 1 WHERE id = #{id} AND deleteFlag = false
